resources.string: • App Ninja: Created 5+ fully functional applications for Android and iOS devices in both software industry and academia\n• Known for writing efficient, maintainable and reusable code\n• Proficient in design, data structures, problem-solving, and debugging

Media-X Systems Inc.
October 2015 – August 2016 (11 months)Ottawa
Mobile developer (Android and iOS), UI and UX design
 • Designed and implemented the iCoach Mobile (tm) app that allows users to record, upload and manage videos directly from their device to their iCoach account and also it allows them invite feedback. (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.media_x.icoach)
 • Web development (REST APIs)

University of Ottawa / Université d'Ottawa
